item.title: The Lexus LC performance coupe has been introduced in the UAE
item.description: The 2018 Lexus LC, a flagship performance coupe now available from Al-Futtaim Motors, the UAE’s exclusive Lexus distributor, seamlessly blends striking aesthetics, exhilarating performance, long-distance comfort, and superior craftsmanship. This production coupe embodies the essence of the handcrafted Lexus LFA supercar and visually echoes the Lexus LF-LC concept. Christopher Buxton, Managing Director of Lexus at Al-Futtaim Motors, highlights the brand’s strong presence in the UAE, particularly its leadership in luxury hybrid vehicles over the past seven years.

item.title: Lexus has launched the new NX luxury crossover, accompanied by video advertisements
item.description: Source: Lexus. The Lexus NX. Lexus has launched the NX, a luxury crossover. The 2015 NX marketing campaign highlights how the vehicle surpasses typical SUVs to provide urban drivers with a stylish option that suits their dynamic lifestyles. “This is Lexus’ first venture into the entry luxury crossover market. The NX is a dynamic vehicle that combines high-end design with practicality,” said Brian Smith, Lexus’ VP of marketing. “This campaign showcases the fun driving experience and adventurous spirit of this vehicle, which boasts a bold, angular design and a powerful turbocharged engine.
